availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, attorney. Bourbon County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary Ann Monroe Wheat on July 22, 1831. Married to Anna M. Logan Wheat in 1857. Father of Laura Wheat and Benjamin L. Wheat. Attorney in Adair County in 1850. Served as circuit judge of the Eighth Judicial District in 1850. Served as circuit judge of the Fifth Judicial District from 1851 to 1856. Attorney in Adair County in 1860.

Kurt X. Metzmeier, "Judges of the Kentucky Circuit Courts, 1831-1861," Kentucky Ancestors: A Genealogical Quarterly of the Kentucky Historical Society, Vol. 43, No. 3 (Spring 2008), 156-8.
